body:
Attempting to land https://go-review.googlesource.com/10832 showed that this issue remains present on 386. This is a regression, previously 8g was able to compile this code.
```
##### ../test
# go run run.go -- fixedbugs/issue8101.go
exit status 1
run compiler with -v for register allocation sites
/tmp/workdir/go/test/fixedbugs/issue8101.go:15: internal compiler error: out of fixed registers
```
https://storage.googleapis.com/go-build-log/2b8cc5d9/linux-386_c549e65d.log
